title: Hitting 30 should take less xp
body: Holy shit this is torture. The players are so bad its actually giving me a terminal disease, and it takes sooooooooooo long to hit 30. Riot needs to tone this down a lot if they actually want people to stop buying accounts.

replies.body: Only reason I got permed is because I bought the acc unranked so I didn't have to do this tho

hi
buy a friend
*oh i meant find a friend


goodday
Even duo the games suck, they just last slightly less
